sentences.en: A church in Moscow became a repository for police files.
sentences.cn: 莫斯科的一座教堂成为警察局档案的存放处。

sentences.en: Can deleted but your additions to the repository will lost.
sentences.cn: 可以被删除,但是你加入知识库的细节会丢失.

sentences.en: He was a repository of all her secrets.
sentences.cn: 她的一切秘密她都肯告诉他.

sentences.en: She was a repository of all his secrets.
Submitting her changes to the repository is the operation we call " checkin "
sentences.cn: 提交她的变更到配置库中的操作就是我们所说的 “ 签入 ”

sentences.en: The book is a repository of curious information.
The cell nucleus is the main repository of genetic information.
sentences.cn: 细胞核是贮藏遗传信息的主要场所.

sentences.en: The man is a repository of curious information.
The man is a repository of out - of - the - way knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这人有满腹 稀奇古怪 的知识.

sentences.en: The repository database on disk has barely increased in size.
sentences.cn: 库只是在磁盘空间上增加了点.

sentences.en: The repository is the official archive of our work.
sentences.cn: 库是我们的正式的档案.

sentences.en: The repository of all important knowledge in a small town was the chief barman of the local pub.
sentences.cn: 小镇上最无所不知的人就是当地酒吧里的服务员领班。

sentences.en: The waste repository was usually the nearest watercourse.
sentences.cn: 废物容纳地点一般是离城市最近的水域.

sentences.en: This recognition will provide an important basis for repository siting site area.
sentences.cn: 这一认识,为处置库选址提供了重要依据.

sentences.en: With this approach, a repository path is sufficient to describe a location.
sentences.cn: 这种方式下, 库路径就可以充分的表述位置了.

sentences.en: Your repository may have similar longevity, or even longer.
sentences.cn: 你的库可能有类似的寿命, 甚至更长.

words.tran_cn: 使复位；改变…的位置；使变换阵地
贮藏室，仓库；知识库；智囊团

trans.tran_cn: 仓库，贮藏室，博物馆，亲信
trans.tran_en: a place or container in which large quantities of something are stored
